header.title: Find your<br class="md:hidden"> own way<br class="md:hidden"> in sport
header.text: New app for productive sport activities is available now

why.title: Why you should choose us?
list: Get your workout in, a massage or even a mani/pedi with the same membership.
Memberships are month-to-month and we make changing your plan easy.
Book at any studio, gym, salon or spa you want, as many times as you want.

listImage.text:
Exercise routines: built exercise routines that you can follow along with, either at home or in the gym.
Tracking tools: track your progress over time, either by logging the exercises you've completed, the amount of weight you've lifted, or the number of calories you've burned.
Personalized recommendations: we use data about your fitness level, goals, and preferences to make personalized workout recommendations.

Video classes: Our app is a great way to practice yoga at home or on-the-go. Yoga available that offer a variety of features and styles of yoga, from beginner-level classes to advanced poses.
Personalized recommendations: the app might suggest specific poses or sequences that are best suited to your body type, or recommend a yoga routine based on your fitness level.
Tracking tools: Some yoga apps allow you to track your progress all time.

WOD tracking: allow you to log your daily workouts, known as WODs (Workouts of the Day), so you can track your progress over time.
Exercise libraries: app include libraries of exercises, with detailed instructions and videos for proper form and technique.
Leaderboards: we have leaderboards that allow you to see how your performance compares to other users, either within your own gym or across the broader CrossFit community.
